statements: SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE access_level = 2;
SELECT password, username FROM users WHERE user_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE access_level < 3 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, access_level FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'john%' ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, access_level FROM users WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE access_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' OR username LIKE '%Z';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users, MAX(access_level) AS max_access_level FROM users;
SELECT * FROM user_access;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM user_access WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM inventory_data ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory_data WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory_data WHERE price < 50;
SELECT * FROM user_access WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT access_level, user_id FROM user_access WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory_data WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM inventory_data WHERE item_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT item_name, price, modified_by FROM inventory_data WHERE modified_by = 101;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, access_level FROM users ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory WHERE price > 50;
SELECT user_id, item_id FROM permissions WHERE can_view = true ORDER BY user_id, item_id;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE access_level = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE access_level > 1
SELECT username, access_level FROM users ORDER BY access_level DESC
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY quantity ASC
SELECT u.username, i.item_name, p.can_view FROM users u JOIN permissions p ON p.user_id = u.user_id JOIN inventory i ON p.item_id = i.item_id
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 50.00
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, access_level FROM users WHERE access_level > 1;
SELECT role_id, role_name, description FROM roles WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE can_view_inventory = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE access_level > 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE access_level = 3 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.can_modify_inventory FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN permissions p ON p.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT user_id FROM permissions WHERE can_view_inventory = TRUE AND can_modify_inventory = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, access_level FROM users WHERE access_level > 1;
SELECT user_id, username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;

SELECT users.username, roles.role_name, permissions.permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT user_id, username, description FROM users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 1);
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT username, access_level FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_id IN (SELECT role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1);
